name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.storage.policy.satisfier.work.multiplier.per.iteration
description:
*Note*: Advanced property. Change with caution.
    This determines the total amount of block transfers to begin in
    one iteration, for satisfy the policy. The actual number is obtained by
    multiplying this multiplier with the total number of live nodes in the
    cluster. The result number is the number of blocks to begin transfers
    immediately. This number can be any positive, non-zero integer.

name: ftp.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  ftp.stream-buffer-size

name: dfs.client.refresh.read-block-locations.ms
description: Refreshing LocatedBlocks period. A value of 0 disables the feature.

name: dfs.balancer.dispatcherThreads
description:
Size of the thread pool for the HDFS balancer block mover.
    dispatchExecutor

name: mapreduce.job.ubertask.maxmaps
description:
Threshold for number of maps, beyond which job is considered
  too big for the ubertasking optimization.  Users may override this value,
  but only downward.
